name: Silly Homophones Quiz | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text: A person who is a whiz at making money.
An okay to climb a mountain
A teacher of a person who plays woodwind instruments.
The property that is never rented is the
While we are talking about fawns, while the bucks sleep and the fawns nap, the...
Multiple aisles filled with fragrant red thorny blossoms.
A monk who works for KFC.
questions.correct: Fryer friar & Friar fryer & Friar frier & Frier friar
questions.explanation:
Fryer friar & Friar fryer & Friar frier & Frier friar.

	For those outside the US- KFC is Kentucky Fried Chicken.

questions.correct: Airy aerie & airy eyrie & airy aery & airy eyry
questions.explanation:
Airy aerie & airy eyrie & airy aery & airy eyry.

	Congratulations if you spelled this one right!
